extensions.name: Octotree
extensions.description: Browser extensions to display GitHub code in tree format.

extensions.name: ZenHub
extensions.description: Project management suite that works natively within GitHub.

extensions.name: GitHub Notifier
extensions.description: Displays your GitHub notifications unread count on toolbar.

extensions.name: LGTM
extensions.description: Click the icon on browser and an interesting LGTM will be copied to your clipboard as markdown format.

extensions.name: Lovely forks
extensions.description: Firefox/Chrome extension for showing notable forks of repositories.

extensions.name: GitHub Highlight Selected
extensions.description: Chrome extension for highlighting selected word in GitHub source view like Sublime Text.

extensions.name: GitHub Linker
extensions.description: Link dependencies in a package or bower file to their GitHub page.

extensions.name: Sourcegraph
extensions.description: Instant documentation tooltips and jump-to-definition links for code on GitHub.

extensions.name: GitHub TOC
extensions.description: Generate TOC (Table of Content) for GitHub readme and GitHub Wiki.

extensions.name: Isometric Contributions
extensions.description: Render an isometric pixel art version of your contribution graph.

extensions.name: GitHub.Expandinizr
extensions.description: Removes the truncating of file and directory names in the repository browser. Fully expands the website, with breakpoints at 1400px, 1600px and 1800px.

extensions.name: Avatars for GitHub
extensions.description: Displaying user avatars in github news feed page.
